[`PluginManifest`](PluginManifest.md)

## PluginManifest interface

Metadata about a Community plugin.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface PluginManifest 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [`author`](PluginManifest.author.md) |  | <code>string</code> | The author's name. |
|  [`authorUrl?`](PluginManifest.authorUrl.md) |  | <code>string</code> | _(Optional)_ A URL to the author's website. |
|  [`description`](PluginManifest.description.md) |  | <code>string</code> | A description of the plugin. |
|  [`dir?`](PluginManifest.dir.md) |  | <code>string</code> | _(Optional)_ Vault path to the plugin folder in the config directory. |
|  [`id`](PluginManifest.id.md) |  | <code>string</code> | The plugin ID. |
|  [`isDesktopOnly?`](PluginManifest.isDesktopOnly.md) |  | <code>boolean</code> | _(Optional)_ Whether the plugin can be used only on desktop. |
|  [`minAppVersion`](PluginManifest.minAppVersion.md) |  | <code>string</code> | The minimum required Obsidian version to run this plugin. |
|  [`name`](PluginManifest.name.md) |  | <code>string</code> | The display name. |
|  [`version`](PluginManifest.version.md) |  | <code>string</code> | The current version, using . |
